Package emissary.core

Class SafeUsageChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • emissary.core.SafeUsageChecker
  • public class SafeUsageChecker
extends Object
    Utility for validating that Places safely interact with IBDO payloads in byte array form. Specifically, this class helps with validating that changes to a IBDO's payload are followed by a call to the setData(byte[]), setData(byte[], int, int), or setChannelFactory(SeekableByteChannelFactory) method.
